name: PERIHELION DEMO v0.3
description:
A gameplay demo of version 0.3 is now available for download! Please consider submitting feedback on your gameplay experience to help us make the game better as we continue development.

Follow our dev blog!

Join the Discord server to give feedback, discuss the game with the community, and see live development updates from the creators !

Or, upload your feedback here!

Perihelion is a visual novel about identity and coming of age. As the only human living in a world of dragons, you must navigate new and old relationships alike during your last autumn as a high school student and prepare for your life to change forever.

Features:

  • Five unique character routes, as well as two secret routes! Or at least their beginnings...
  • Free-time system that allows you to choose where and with whom to spend your time - featuring 8 locations where you can hang out and be a teenage hooligan
  • Sick in-progress UI design and sprites
  • Choices that affect the story
  • Choices that DON'T affect the story
  • Some bugs, hopefully not too many. Hopefully you'll help us find them
